Raise Dead.Name: Raise Dead
Raise Dead.Description: One allied Zombie or Skeleton that was Incapacitated after the end of your last turn immediately returns to the battle, no longer counting towards your Rout Threshold. Place the model within 5" of the Caster. The model cannot be placed such that it is Engaged with an enemy.

Soul Rend.Name: Soul Rend
Soul Rend.Description: Basic. Cast Attack. Target one unit you can see within 15" and perform a Cast Attack against them. If this spell Incapacitates the target, create a Zombie where it was Incapacitated. It is an ally to you and will count towards your Rout Threshold.

Control Dead.Name: Control Dead
Control Dead.Description: Choose a point within 5" of the caster. Any allied Zombies or Skeletons within 1.5" of that point may immediately move again up to their Move. If this moves them into base contact with an enemy unit, they count as Engaging.

Lifestealer.Name: Lifestealer
Lifestealer.Description: Choose a single unit within 5". The target suffers a Wound (no check required) and is automatically Incapacitated if this is its last Wound. The caster gains an extra Wound for the duration of the battle. This may take the caster's Wounds above its maximum value. This spell does not affect Undead units.

Necromantic Hex.Name: Hex
Necromantic Hex.Description: Ongoing. Choose a single enemy within 10". The target has Disadvantage on all Checks it makes.

Bless Weapon.Name: Bless Weapon
Bless Weapon.Description: Ongoing. The caster gains Advantage on all Melee Checks.

Divine Fervour.Name: Divine Fervour
Divine Fervour.Description: Reduce any Injury results against allies within 5" of the caster (including themselves) by 3 until the end of the turn.

Holy Smite.Name: Holy Smite
Holy Smite.Description: Make an Injury Roll against all enemies within 5". Add +2 to the Check if the enemy is Undead.

Invisibility.Name: Invisibility
Invisibility.Description: Ongoing. Choose one ally within 5" (including themselves). This unit is treated as no longer existing for the purposes of targeting or blocking Movement, line-of-sight or picking up Treasure. If it is Engaged, it is no longer Engaged and moves 1". If this unit Engages, casts a Spell, or makes a Ranged attack, the spell ends.

Control Earth.Name: Control Earth
Control Earth.Description: Choose a point within 10". Place a piece of natural terrain (a wood, mesa, etc.) at that point. The terrain cannot be larger than 3" in any dimension. Some leniency should be made if it fits the spirit of the spell. The terrain must fit within the space. If this is cast on a unit, move that unit to the closest space that it can be safely placed (this may be within or on the new terrain).

Root.Name: Root
Root.Description: Ongoing. Choose one unit within 20". That unit cannot Engage, Move, or Run.

Earthquake.Name: Earthquake
Earthquake.Description: All units within 10" must make an Agility check or become Dazed.

Magic Arrow.Name: Magic Arrow
Magic Arrow.Description: Basic. Cast Attack. Target one unit you can see within 30" and perform a Cast Attack.

Heal.Name: Heal
Heal.Description: Any ally within 2" of the caster (including themselves) removes Dazed or Staggered and regains 1 Wound, up to their maximum.

Blood Frenzy.Name: Blood Frenzy
Blood Frenzy.Description: Ongoing. Choose one unit within 5", including the caster. It gains the Berserk and Ambush skills.

Lure.Name: Lure
Lure.Description: Basic. Target one unit you can see within 15". The target immediately moves towards the Caster by the most direct path, including by Jumping Down. If the target is able to reach the Caster, it is placed in base contact and the Caster is considered to have Engaged it.

Blight Bolt.Name: Blight Bolt
Blight Bolt.Description: Cast Attack. Target one unit you can see within 10" and perform a Cast Attack against them. On a success, the target makes a Plague Check.

Bat wings.Name: Bat wings
Bat wings.Description: Ongoing. Choose one ally within 5", including the caster. That unit gains the Flying skill.

Vampiric Hex.Name: Hex
Vampiric Hex.Description: Ongoing. Choose a single enemy within 10". The target has Disadvantage on all Checks it makes.

Swarm of Rats.Name: Swarm of Rats
Swarm of Rats.Description: Cast Attack. Choose the closest enemy within 10". Make a Cast Attack against the target. If you succeed, make an Injury Roll against all units within 1.5" of it.

Sewer Filth.Name: Sewer Filth
Sewer Filth.Description: Basic. Target one unit you can see within 20". The target is Dazed.

Pounce.Name: Pounce
Pounce.Description: The caster gains 2 Attacks and +3 Injury until the end of this turn. They may immediately make an Engage action, unless they are already Engaged.

Death Visage.Name: Death Visage
Death Visage.Description: All enemies in base contact with the caster that are not Stunned or Dazed make an immediate Morale check. If they fail, the caster makes an attack against the target, which then perfoms a Move directly away from the caster, if able.

Rat Rage.Name: Rat Rage
Rat Rage.Description: Ongoing. Upon casting and at the start of each turn, any Giant Rats within 5" of the caster gain Fear for the round.

Writheform.Name: Writheform
Writheform.Description: Caster gains +1 attack this turn and if they charged this turn their target must make an immediate fear check.

Bend Flesh.Name: Bend Flesh
Bend Flesh.Description: A unit other than the caster within 10" gains +4 defence this turn.

Spew Bile.Name: Spew Bile
Spew Bile.Description: Range 10" covering a 2" diameter area effect from point. Roll an attack with the target 14 per unit in the area of effect. Can hit allies and units in melee. If a unit is hit that is in melee, all connected units are also hit.

Touch of Madness.Name: Touch of Madness
Touch of Madness.Description: Target you are in melee against becomes knocked down.
